fields.name: AvailableApplianceStorageGB
fields.description: The remaining appliance-based storage in GB available for workload use.

fields.name: AvailableCoreCount
fields.description: The remaining number of cores that are available in this cluster for workload use.

fields.name: AvailableHostStorageGB
fields.description: The remaining machine or host-based storage in GB available for workload use.

fields.name: AvailableMemoryGB
fields.description: The remaining memory in GB that are available in this cluster for workload use.

fields.name: TotalApplianceStorageGB
fields.description: The total appliance-based storage in GB supported by this cluster for workload use.

fields.name: TotalCoreCount
fields.description: The total number of cores that are supported by this cluster for workload use.

fields.name: TotalHostStorageGB
fields.description: The total machine or host-based storage in GB supported by this cluster for workload use.

fields.name: TotalMemoryGB
fields.description: The total memory supported by this cluster for workload use.
